Class CcddPatchHandler

    CFS Command & Data Dictionary project database patch handler class

      • ccddMain

        private final CcddMain ccddMain

    • Constructor Detail

      • CcddPatchHandler

        CcddPatchHandler(CcddMain ccddMain)
           throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        CFS Command & Data Dictionary project database patch handler class constructor. THe patch handler is used to integrate application changes that require alteration of the project database schema. The alterations are meant to be transparent to the user; however, once patched older versions of the application are no longer guaranteed to function properly and may have detrimental effects
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If the user elects to not install the patch or an error occurs while applying the patch

    • Method Detail

      • backupDatabase

        private void backupDatabase(CcddDbControlHandler dbControl)
        Backup the project database. Store the backup file in the folder specified in the program preferences (or the CCDD start-up folder if no preference is specified). The file name is a combination of the project's database name and the current date/time stamp
        Parameters:
        dbControl - reference to the database control class

      • updateMessageNamesAndIDs

        private void updateMessageNamesAndIDs()
                               throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Update the project database table type and data field table references to the message ID name and message ID input types. The message name and ID have been combined into a single input type, 'Message name & ID'. Change the message ID name input type to 'Text' and the message ID input type to 'Message name & ID'. Note that the original message ID names are no longer associated with the IDs; this must be done manually
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException

      • updateUserAccess

        private void updateUserAccess()
                       throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Update the project database so that user access levels are supported
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException

      • updatePaddingVariables

        private void updatePaddingVariables()
                             throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Update the padding variable format from '__pad#' to 'pad#__'. This is to accommodate XML exports that don't allow leading underscores in variable names (e.g., EDS)
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
